message.body: Jenna~ Kazuki needs a basement for lotus. We are thinking of using Todman to fake it. Do you have booking hours left? Or any friend who have access to Todman maybe split hours between you guys?
I haven't used any hours this semester, I can reserve a space for us.
U can decide how many hours we need after working on schedule with Kazuki :)

This is for lotus audition. I said don't wanna take up all ur hours maybe ask your studio mates as well. But yeah he needs a 2h thing in Todman for casting and probably happens the March 22nd the Sunday
Thank you so much. If it's too many hours for u let us know will try to find more people
Ugh okay. I'll message him tomorrow then.

Hi kazuki and Jenna, to move on the the next step on location: the apartment I found owner says we can come in any day as long as they got enough time to sleep. And I need to know which day are we using the car so I can hook it ahead of time. Have u you guys figured out Todman booking schedule yet? Just trying to clean things up before I leave for spring break :)
